tool_description: Generates comprehensive photography service contracts with terms, conditions, usage rights, and liability clauses customized for portrait sessions.

client_id.description: Unique client identifier for the contract

quote_number.description: Reference number from the accepted quote

usage_rights.description: Image usage rights: personal_use, commercial_use, limited_commercial, full_rights

model_release_required.description: Whether model release forms are needed

cancellation_policy.description: Cancellation policy type: standard, flexible, strict

error_messages: Client not found: The specified client_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid quote: The quote_number is not found or has expired.
Invalid session date: Session date must be in the future.
Invalid usage rights: Use one of [personal_use, commercial_use, limited_commercial, full_rights].
Invalid copyright option: Use one of [photographer, client, shared].
Invalid cancellation policy: Use one of [standard, flexible, strict].
Invalid payment schedule: Use one of [deposit_only, 50_50, full_upfront].
Contract generation failed: Unable to create contract with provided parameters.
usage: Provide client_id, quote_number, session_date, session_location, and usage_rights to generate a contract. Customize copyright_retention, model_release_required, cancellation_policy, and payment_schedule as needed.

contract_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated contract

contract_status.description: Contract generation status: ready_for_signature, pending, or error

deposit_amount.description: Required deposit amount based on payment schedule

final_payment_due.description: When final payment is due in ISO 8601 format

contract_url.description: URL or reference for accessing the contract document
